content.rendered:
2022 US Open Tennis Schedule

To help you plan your US Open Tennis experience, you can view the tournament schedule below. This tentative schedule includes the highlights of the tournament (the singles play and the doubles finals) but there is plenty more to see at the US Open. If you’re interested in another division including mixed doubles, wheelchair, junior, or senior competitions, we are happy to provide more detailed scheduling information.

While many fans are eager to check out the big names playing at Arthur Ashe Stadium, there are other opportunities to take advantage of. For a closer glimpse of your favorite player, check out the practice courts. Or if you’re in town early, you can experience US Open Fan Week, including the qualifying tournament. Whatever your ideal experience looks like, our team is at your service to plan an itinerary that suits you perfectly.
